description: Try our easy to follow Macadamia-Crusted Roast Lamb recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Macadamia-Crusted Roast Lamb Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove lamb from oven and cover loosely with foil. Rest for 10 minutes before carving. Serve with rustic mint sauce.
